column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: On 04 November 2018 at 2.40 pm  ------Immigration------ and Customs Enforcement officers received a foreigner from the Tonle Bassac police force in Chamkarmon. She was picked up at the Sofitel with no money and and expired visa.------Lieutenant Cheat Chetra
column4: chief of the Department of Investigation and Enforcement of the Phnom Penh Procedures
column7: is a 47-year-old Australian woman.------She went to the Sofitel
column9: and after it transpired she had no money to settle the bill
column10: police were called.------The office head said that after arrest
column11: the office staff discovered she came to Cambodia on September 04
column13: through Siem Reap International Airport as a tourist and was supposed to leave within a month.------ ------She has been sent to the General Department to carry out the procedures of the law.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/730378.html------http://cambodiapolice.com/policekh/131773
